AboutMe

Hi There!I'm Rodrigo Nunes

I am a front end developer, who likes to work with creative and challenging projects that change people's lives, providing the best experiences. As a programmer I always try to work with the best practices for an optimized and functional code, I like to try out new technologies and tools that can improve development.

In free time I dedicate reading, hobbies and research on emerging technologies, design strategies and concepts, and everything else that can be applied to web development.
